name: Let's Discuss Terms
tagline: Terms of Service for DHDC Discussion Forums
body:
# Coming Soon

We need to decide on the appropriate Terms of Service for our discussion forums. We're working hard to get this right. 

Please feel free to help us out by issuing pull requests for this repository. Or tell us what you think by [posting a comment](http://discuss.dhcuration.org/category/meta) in the forums themselves.

Thanks,

The Digital Humanities Data Curation Team
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
